amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in this bill for the use of "enhanced use leases" at the three original National Homes for Disabled Volunteer Soldiers (Soldier's Home Branches) established before 1868.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-195 to prohibit the use of funds in this bill for the use of `enhanced use leases' at the three original National Homes for Disabled Volunteer Soldiers (Soldier's Home Branches) established before 1868.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
